explanations.machine learning: The paper compares discrete choice models with machine learning models (specifically neural networks) for modeling mobility tool ownership.
explanations.neural network: The study applies both shallow and deep neural network models to simulate multiple mobility tool ownership simultaneously.
explanations.deep learning: The paper discusses the use of deep neural networks (with three hidden layers) and compares their performance with shallow networks.
explanations.hidden layer: The research evaluates neural networks with different numbers of hidden layers, noting that networks with one hidden layer were more robust and easier to interpret.
